summary: A young scientist and his friends, upon being attacked by demons, are protected by a gang of animated puppets.
cast: Gordon Currie|Chandra West|Ash Adams|Teresa Hill|Guy Rolfe|Felton Perry|Stacie Randall|Michael Shamus Wiles|Dan Zukovic|Albert Band|Jake McKinnon
